short_summary: Purchase of Boost/Backwash Pump and Motor. Delivery to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
description: Purchase of items listed in the request for proposal.
duration_in_months: These contact details will end once a purchase contract is signed. Please copy and paste this email to contact the Procurement Specialist "/jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca". Phone: 819-939-3674
